resources.string:
Hi, my name is Minh 
I admire Socrates for the way he finds the truth through "Socratic" questions. 
Life is a mystery, not a gift. We are to find our meaning by being a detective, not a mere receiver. 

I like the beautiful of universe. Numbers. Lines. Motions. Abstractions. 
I prefer understanding how a machine work to making a friend, therefore I am not very sociable. 
I like to be alone doing interesting (miscellaneous) things. Competing with myself is always more interesting than competing with others. 

I like philosophy, but I am not a sophist (which means "wise man" and none about "lying"). 

I am lucky to have a blessed life, mom, dad, a little sister, a fine body and a working mind. A peaceful life. A culture that values learning. However, I am lucky or unlucky to have wicked thoughts, a social shyness, an immutably primal fear and a perhaps-deadly curiosity. 

Life passes. Sooner or later, I would die. About me, let my doings, my thought talks for itself.
